title: Google | L4 | Bangalore
content:
Continuing from where you left off:

After the HC feedback came in, my recruiter told me that it went well, and there wouldn’t be a need for a 4th round. I was relieved! Then, she came back with the numbers for the offer. Everything was falling into place!

Education: B.tech from one of the old IITs
Years of Experience:5
Current Company :SSE at startup
Current TC : 35(Base) + 18LPA stocks per year

Date of the Offer:25th Sept 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4 / SWEIII
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 35L + 2.85(Employer's PF + Gratuity)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 6L Sign on Bonus
Stock bonus:$102k - 38% 32% 20% 1%
Bonus: 15%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 1st year ~81L , (they said they will give refresher but have heard it has been reduced)
Benefits: Usual Google benefits
Other details: Have no counter offers, so accepted the offer, also they said they won't increase TC but can reduce and increase components based on my preference but i don't want to wait anymore( already 3 months since first screening round)

Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5872731/Google-L4-or-Bangalore-or-Jul-Sep-2024
salaryTotal: : 1st Year ~81l , (they Said They Will Give Refresher But Have Heard It Has Been Reduced)

title: Blinkit | SDE-2 | Sep 2024
content:
```
Education: B.Tech Tier-3 College
Years of Experience: 3+ years
Prior Experience: SDE-1 at FAANG
Date of the Offer: Sep 2024
Company: Blinkit
Title: Software Development Engineer 2 
Location: Gurgaon, India
Salary/Base: ₹35,00,000
Annual Bonus: ₹12,00,000 (linked to performance but it is usually given)
Stock bonus: N/A (Zomato ESOPs awarded based on 6 months performance review)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ₹47,00,000
Previous CTC: ₹30,00,000  (₹23,50,000 Base +  ₹6,50,000 Stocks)
Other Details: Didn't negotiate much
```

Interview Experience -https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5869260/blinkit-sde-2-sep-2024-offer
